short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import your deck list as a deck on Altered.gg.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension let's you import a deck list in the official Altered TCG deckbuilder.

How to use :
- Copy your deck list (e.g., from https://altered-db.com), ensuring it contains all card IDs and quantities. The hero must be on the first line.
- Go to the official Altered website and log into your account.
- Launch the extension and paste your deck list into the large text box.
- (Optional) Add a name to your deck.
- Click the "Import Deck" button.
- Wait for your deck to appear on the official Altered website.

Deck List Example :
1 ALT_CORE_B_OR_01_C
1 ALT_CORE_B_AX_07_R2
1 ALT_CORE_B_BR_04_R2
...
